attributes.action: Allow the Police/Army to use Deadly Force on Rioters and criminals.
attributes.additional_details:
After the events of past days, The government has shown itself to be unprepared or unwilling to deal with any unrest or insurrection. Theresa May has said that we(the Government) does not use water cannons or rubber bullets and maintains law and order "by consent" by consent of whom? certainly not the sane, rational element of society still left in this broken country.

Please sign this petition, and we the people can give the Weak,namby-pamby government all the "consent" it wants!!!!
